name: Supernova (itch) (sadzanenyama)
description:
BE SURE TO ENABLE SOUND AS IT MAY BE OFF BY DEFAULT

Art by: https://samzi.itch.io/

Made for the GMTK 2019  game jam. Download windows build for best experience.

You are a spaceship running away from a star that has just gone into super nova. But there's catch, you only have 1 HP. Any feedback is extremely appreciated.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Rotate Shield: Move mouse

Quit to main menu: Q

I did not create the music or skybox

https://www.bensound.com/

Leaderboard:

1) Sadzanenyama: 610
